      • getLoanHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.bson.Document> getLoanHistory(java.lang.String studentNum,
                                                             java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                             java.util.Date toDate)
        This method returns the entire loan history of any given student, for the time-frame specified from the date parameters parsed.
        Parameters:
        studentNum - The student number associated with the loan history requested
        fromDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will start at.
        toDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will end at.
        Returns:
        The loan history, as a FindIterable array of Documents.

      • getStudentReturnedHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.bson.Document> getStudentReturnedHistory(java.lang.String studentNum,
                                                                        java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                                        java.util.Date toDate)
        This method returns all of the books returned of any given student, for the time-frame specified from the date parameters parsed.
        Parameters:
        studentNum - The unique student number given to a student
        fromDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will start at.
        toDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will end at.
        Returns:
        The loan history, as a FindIterable array of Documents.

      • getReturnedHistoryByLoanRecNum

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.bson.Document> getReturnedHistoryByLoanRecNum(java.lang.String loanRecordNumber,
                                                                             java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                                             java.util.Date toDate)
        This method returns all of the books returned of any given student, for the time-frame specified from the date parameters parsed.
        Parameters:
        loanRecordNumber - The Loan Record number associated with the returned books requested
        fromDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will start at.
        toDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will end at.
        Returns:
        The loan history, as a FindIterable array of Documents.

      • getFineHistory

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.bson.Document> getFineHistory(java.lang.String studentNumber,
                                                             java.util.Date fromDate,
                                                             java.util.Date toDate)
        This method returns the entire fine history of any given student, for the time-frame specified from the date parameters parsed.
        Parameters:
        studentNumber - A unique student number to identify the student
        fromDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will start at.
        toDate - The date that will determine the day at which the returned history will end at.
        Returns:
        The fine history, as an ArrayList of Documents.

                       java.lang.String isbn)
        This method inserts a book as a returned book, into the loan record specified.
        Parameters:
        loanRecordNum - The loan record associated with the book returned

      • payFine

        public void payFine(java.lang.String loanRecordNum,
                    java.lang.String isbn,
                    double amountPaid)
        This method inserts a fine document, associated with an already loaned loan record and book.
        Parameters:
        loanRecordNum - The loan record number associated with the fine being paid
        isbn - The ISBN of the book associated with the fine
        amountPaid - The amount of fine that is being paid
